mapper.select: SELECT T_ICIN1.DocEntry AS 'BaseEntry', /*货源编号*/ T_ICIN1.LineNum AS 'BaseLine', /*货源行号*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoModle, /*报价型号*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoBrand, /*报价品牌*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoDelivery, /*报价交期*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoYear, /*报价批次*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoQty, /*报价数量*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoPrice, /*供方报价*/ T_ICIN1.U_Buyer, /*采购员编号*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate, /*报价日期*/ T_OUSI.UserName AS 'BuyerName', /*采购员姓名*/ BuyerDept.Name AS 'DeptName', /*采购部门名称*/ T_ICIN1.U_QCDesc, /*质检标准*/ ( CASE WHEN #{sc.docEntry} != T_ICIN1.DocEntry THEN N'未询价' WHEN T_ICIN1.U_Status = 'Y' AND T_ICIN1.U_OriginEntry IS NULL THEN N'已询价' WHEN T_ICIN1.U_Status = 'C' AND T_ICIN1.U_OriginEntry IS NOT NULL THEN N'已确认' WHEN T_ICIN1.U_Status = 'W' AND T_ICIN1.U_OriginEntry IS NOT NULL THEN N'待确认' WHEN T_ICIN1.U_Status = 'U' THEN N'已更新' END ) AS 'QuoState', /*询价状态：是否已询价*/ N'采购报价' AS 'Resource', /*货源类型*/ T_ICIN.CardCode, /*客户代码*/ T_ICIN.U_CusGroupCode, /*客户类型*/ T_ICIN.U_Region, /*客户地区*/ T_ICIN.U_DomainName, /*客户行业*/ U_ICIN1.UrgentType, /*紧急程度*/ U_ICIN1.Secrecy, /*是否保密*/ U_ICIN1.Modle, /*需求型号*/ U_ICIN1.Brand, /*需求品牌*/ U_ICIN1.DemandQty, /*需求数量*/ U_ICIN1.ECCN, /*ECCN*/ Exchange.Rate AS ExchangeRate, U_ICIN1.KeyPoint /*重要程度*/ FROM T_ICIN1 LEFT JOIN T_ICIN ON T_ICIN.DocEntry = #{sc.docEntry} LEFT JOIN U_ICIN1 ON U_ICIN1.DocEntry = #{sc.docEntry} AND U_ICIN1.LineNum = #{sc.lineNum} LEFT JOIN T_OUSI ON T_ICIN1.U_Buyer = T_OUSI.UserSign LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DeptCode, Name, ( CASE WHEN T_OCDP.Name = N'海外组' THEN 1 WHEN T_OCDP.Name = N'大中华组' THEN 1 WHEN T_OCDP.Name = N'亚洲组' THEN 2 WHEN T_OCDP.Name = N'欧洲组' THEN 2 WHEN T_OCDP.Name = N'北美组' THEN 2 END ) AS 'Code' FROM T_OCDP ) BuyerDept ON T_OUSI.DftDept = BuyerDept.DeptCode /*采购部门*/ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T_ORTT.Currency, T_ORTT.Rate FROM ( SELECT Currency, MAX(RateDate) AS RateDate FROM T_ORTT GROUP BY Currency ) T LEFT JOIN T_ORTT ON T_ORTT.Currency = T.Currency AND T_ORTT.RateDate = T.RateDate UNION ALL SELECT 'RMB' AS 'Currency', 1.000000 AS 'Rate' ) Exchange ON Exchange.Currency = T_ICIN1.U_QuoCurr WHERE U_QuoModle IN ( SELECT SDADA_1.sno FROM SDADA SDADA_1 WHERE SDADA_1.TAG IN ( SELECT SDADA.TAG FROM SDADA WHERE SDADA.sno = #{sc.modle} ) ) AND ( /*有效货源*/ /*海外组、大中华组2天有效；亚洲组、欧洲组、北美组3天内有效*/ (BuyerDept.Code = 1 AND DateDiff(dd, T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate, getdate()) <= 60) OR (BuyerDept.Code = 2 AND DateDiff(dd, T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate, getdate()) <= 60) ) /*去掉正在确认和已确认的货源*/ AND T_ICIN1.LineNum NOT IN ( SELECT U_OriginLine FROM T_ICIN1 WHERE U_OriginLine IS NOT NULL AND DocEntry = #{sc.docEntry} )
